announcements.title: Weekly Sports Night - Come out and play!
announcements.subtitle: Every Friday
announcements.details: Join us every Friday for sports night! All cadets welcome to participate in various sports activities.

announcements.title: Supply Night Reminder
announcements.subtitle: September 11, 2025
announcements.details: Next supply night is on September 11th from 6:30 PM to 8:30 PM at the Squadron Office.

announcements.title: Fall Training Schedule
announcements.subtitle: Starting September 10
announcements.details: Fall training schedule is now available. Check the calendar for details.

announcements.title: Annual Ceremonial Review
announcements.subtitle: Save the Date
announcements.details: ACR preparations begin next month. All cadets are expected to participate.

announcements.title: Field Training Exercise
announcements.subtitle: October 15-17, 2025
announcements.details: Registration for the fall FTX is now open. Sign up with your flight commander.

announcements.title: Marksmanship Practice
announcements.subtitle: Every Thursday
announcements.details: Marksmanship team practices every Thursday from 6:30-8:30 PM.

announcements.title: Band Rehearsal
announcements.subtitle: Weekly Sessions
announcements.details: Band members: regular rehearsals continue every training night.

announcements.title: Community Service
announcements.subtitle: Upcoming Opportunities
announcements.details: Community service events planned for November. Watch for sign-up sheets.
